text: Va ʙa sumo namegujam, ki gancinahoi Alloh taolo nazdi man ast va ƣajʙ namedonam va namegujam, ki man faristaam va dar ʙorai kasone, ki ʙa casmi sumo haqir meojand, namegujam, ki Alloh taolo xajre nasiʙason naxohad kard. Alloh taolo ʙa on ci dar dilhoi eson ast, ogohtar ast. [Agar cunin ʙigujam] Dar on surat, hatman, az sitamgoron xoham ʙud»
